message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. It's a good deal, especially considering the inflation!
You took 90% last round, now it's my turn to take a bigger share
Okay, let's be reasonable. I'll take 70% and you get 30%. This is a fair compromise, and we both still get a decent amount.
You're trying to take more each round, I'll take more this time
Let's meet in the middle this time. I'll take 60%, and you get 40%. This is a good chance for us to both get something and avoid the risk of getting nothing.
You're not willing to meet in the middle, so I'll take a bigger share this time
We're getting close to the end, and the value of the money is dropping fast. Let's split it evenly this time, 50/50. It's the best chance we have to get something.
